experience.description: Led the development and maintenance of the Tesla web application, a comprehensive platform for managing vehicles, customers, and fleets. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality user experiences and ensure seamless integration with Tesla's APIs.

Led the development and maintenance of a complex single-page application using React, Redux, and modern JavaScript libraries. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality user experiences.

Developed and maintained user interfaces for web and mobile applications using React Native and other cutting-edge technologies. Contributed to the design and implementation of responsive and accessible user experiences.

Played a key role in building a scalable and performant e-commerce platform using React and Node.js. Implemented new features and improved existing functionalities to enhance user engagement and conversion rates.
